definitions.Definition: No citizen left behind in digital support
definitions.Basic: Limited exposure: Cultural aversion, minimal tech use.

definitions.Transformational: Digital society: No gap, tech ingrained in society.

definitions.Definition: Ability to use digital technology of all parts of society (all regions, age groups, genders); particularly of traditionally marginalized groups of society (refugees and migrants, women and youth, persons with disabilities and special needs, older people,
definitions.Basic: Elite: Educated, skilled minority. Digital divide persists.
definitions.Opportunistic: Private: Basic skills, some schools, company training.
definitions.Systematic: Elective: Basic skills widespread, optional school learning.
definitions.Differentiating: Cultivated: Schools teach, tech equipped curriculum.
definitions.Transformational: Widespread: Universal skills, adult centers, industry shift, integrated education.

definitions.Definition: Use of digital technology by different levels of society, financial inclusiveness, e-commerce activity, information access trends.
definitions.Basic: Basic: Tech for leisure, low access and adoption.
definitions.Opportunistic: Transactional: Moderate use, gaps in access.
definitions.Systematic: Intermediate: Complex actions, info access, tech ownership.
definitions.Differentiating: Advanced: Complex services, reduced divide.
definitions.Transformational: Proficient: Comprehensive, universal access, reduced divide.

definitions.Definition: Understanding and mitigating harm inflicted by digital such as addiction, cyberbullying, disinformation, physical impacts.
definitions.Basic: Resistant: Low tech adoption, change incentives lacking.
definitions.Opportunistic: Tolerant: Tech as last resort.
definitions.Systematic: Accepting: Trial-error, active use, known channels.
definitions.Differentiating: Enthusiastic: Open, innovative, motivated tech adoption.
definitions.Transformational: Advocating: Full tech integration, societal reshaping.

definitions.Basic: Restricted: Tech not for citizen-govt interaction, voice exclusion.

definitions.Systematic: Community: Tech solves local issues, citizen decision influence.
definitions.Differentiating: Engaged: Tech shapes decisions, ethics guide communication.
definitions.Transformational: Participative: Integrated civic platforms, inclusive discourse, media outlets, encouraged participation.

definitions.Definition: Foundational digital catalysts are overarching digital systems which can accelerate progress in all parts of the digital transformation.

definitions.Opportunistic: Basic IDs, early digital payments, limited sharing.
definitions.Systematic: Digital IDs, mobile banking, online data sharing.
definitions.Differentiating: Integrated IDs, digital wallets, accessible data.

definitions.Opportunistic: Changing: Digital access, cards, online banking, cashless.

definitions.Differentiating: Differentiating: Decoupled payments, digital wallets.
definitions.Transformational: Transformational: Widespread digital payments, local currencies.
